extendedInfo.description: WOWK is the premiere news leader for the Huntington â Charleston, West Virginia area. Now you can get the latest news, sports and weather wherever you go with the WOWK Mobile Local News application. Mobile Local News brings the best of 13News straight to your mobile device. It makes viewing and sharing the news easy. With a few steps, you can get the latest news and share it with friends and family by e-mail, text message and even Twitter and Facebook. Whether itâs severe weather, the newest sports scores or breaking news, the WOWK Mobile Local News application keeps you in-the-know while youâre on-the-go. The new WOWKTV.com iPhone app includes: - Local news - West Virginia News - National News - Business News - West Virginia Tonight Live News - Decision Makers Stories - Local and National Sports News - WVU & Marshall Sports News - StormTracker13 Weather Radar and Forecasts - Current conditions that change automatically based on your location. - School Closings and Delays and Severe Weather Alerts - Intuitive, patent-pending navigation - Submit your news pictures and videos to WOWK right from the app - Easy news sharing by e-mail, text message and post to Twitter and Facebook - And moreâ¦ Designed and developed in partnership with DoApp, Inc., best in class in mobile phone development, and Inergize Digital, the media industryâs leading provider of content management solutions, Web sites and interactive technology for television stations and other media companies, the Mobile Local News application makes it easy for media companies to distribute news and information to the mobile masses.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: This app is pretty decent I would like the info faster but you cant have it all but good app to have.
reviews.author: kenneth grier

reviews.title: Very liable
reviews.comment: Stable App compared to most of the local news Apps. My first choice for local news when I\'m on the go. Though unfortunately their live broadcast aren\'t anymore. Especially the morning weather \"personality\".
reviews.author: Tracy McCoy

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good place to get the latest Charleston/Huntington news.
reviews.author: Todd Toms

reviews.comment: Gr8 app.
reviews.author: Anthony Spurlock

reviews.title: Works like it should
reviews.comment: This app works great on my samsung Galaxy S3. The other version that\'s available would not work for me.
reviews.author: Debbie Redd

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: WOWK tv has a great app. It\'s very useful, high tech,and informative, especially in a area like Charleston which is tech starved.
reviews.author: tommy pastena

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Two thumbs up
reviews.author: Aaron Patrick

reviews.title: Danny Carr
reviews.comment: Great App but now won\'t update news on my Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.author: danny Carr

reviews.title: Out of towner
reviews.comment: Glad I can keep up with my home town news clear over here in the lil ole state of Delaware
reviews.author: Hope Cochran

reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Wayne Williams

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: It works fine, most if the time. No bells or whistles here, just a cookie cutter app that has no widget features
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Ive tried them all and this is the best local news app. Much better than 3&8! Get the radar app too. Finally something for lil Charleston!  Yea!
reviews.author: N marie Wilfong

reviews.comment: I like this app,easy to operate,control,find what ur looking for
